ack.p: We thank the men who participated in this study, and the outreach workers of the Yayasan Kerti Praja who took part in recruiting participants. We also acknowledge the role of the UNSW Qualitative Research Network (QRN) Hub Services for their input in the article draft. Dr Luh Putu Lila Wulandari received an Australia Awards Scholarships administered by the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade.
